  • fd 100 rt 90 fd 100 rt 90 fd 100 rt 90 fd 100 rt 90
  • proc drawPoly(:n,:s)
  rpt :n[fd :s rt (360/:n)
end
make :i 3
rpt 10 [drawPoly(:i,70) make :i :i+1]
		   
		
  • rpt 5[
  fd 50
  rt 144
  rpt 5[fd 70 rt 72]
]		
		
  • rpt 8[
  rt 45 rpt 6
  [
    rpt 90 [fd 2 rt 2]
    rt 90
  ]
]		
		
  • make :a 0.1
rpt 10000[
  fd 0.4 rt :a
  make :a :a+0.001
]	
		
  • make :a 1
rpt 100000[
  fd 1 rt :a
  make :a :a*1.0001
]
